Lecture 1.Title: L1: Introduction to Web Systems
Lecture 1.Description: The lecture covered the course syllabus and schedule, as well as expectations for the course.

Lecture 2.Title: L2: Basics
Lecture 2.Description: This lecture was intended as a memory refresher and to go back to the basics. Topics covered included HTTP, the Internet, and servers.

Lecture 3.Title: L3: CSS Part 1
Lecture 3.Description: This lecture introduced the basics of Cascading Stylesheets (CSS) to prepare students to employ them in labs and the final project.

Lecture 4.Title: L4: Finance Project Ideas
Lecture 4.Description: This lecture focused on Dr. Raffi's ideas for the financial project. Students worked on a lab and preparing to begin the final project.

Lecture 5.Title: L5: CSS Part 2
Lecture 5.Description: This lecture continued the past lecture on CSS, going more in depth on combinators, animations, minification, and other aspects.

Lecture 6.Title: L6: NASA Project Ideas
Lecture 6.Description: This lecture, taking place on Constitution Day, focused on Dr. Assaf's presentation on the NASA project and the requirements for it.
